Facts and Events

Name Princess Elisabeth of Savoy-Carignan Gender Female Birth[1] Marriage to Archduke Rainer Joseph of Austria Death[1] Reference Number Q735831?

the text in this section is copied from an article in Wikipedia

Elisabeth of Savoy (Maria Francesca Elisabetta Carlotta Giuseppina; 13 April 1800 – 25 December 1856) was the Vicereine of the Kingdom of Lombardy–Venetia by marriage to Archduke Rainer Joseph of Austria. She was the aunt and mother-in-law of Vittorio Emanuele II, the first king of a united Italy. By birth, she was a member of the House of Savoy-Carignano.

This page uses content from the English Wikipedia. The original content was at Princess Elisabeth of Savoy-Carignan. The list of authors can be seen in the page history. As with WeRelate, the content of Wikipedia is available under the Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License.
